member.name: HEAPENTRY32
member.summary: Describes one entry (block) of a heap that is being examined.

member.name: HEAPENTRY32.dwSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. Before calling the function, set this member to sizeof(HEAPENTRY32). If you do not initialize dwSize,Heap32First fails.

member.name: HEAPENTRY32.hHandle
member.summary: A handle to the heap block.

member.name: HEAPENTRY32.dwAddress
member.summary: The linear address of the start of the block.

member.name: HEAPENTRY32.dwBlockSize
member.summary: The size of the heap block, in bytes.

summary.para: This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The memory block has a fixed (unmovable) location.
The memory block is not used.
The memory block location can be moved.

member.name: HEAPENTRY32.dwLockCount
member.summary: This member is no longer used and is always set to zero.

member.name: HEAPENTRY32.dwResvd
member.summary: Reserved; do not use or alter.

member.name: HEAPENTRY32.th32ProcessID
member.summary: The identifier of the process that uses the heap.

member.name: HEAPENTRY32.th32HeapID
member.summary: The heap identifier. This is not a handle, and has meaning only to the tool help functions.
